channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hugo
item.description: 下载Hugo https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases 下载完需要配置环境变量 生成站点 hugo new site myblog(一个文件夹的名字) 下载主题 /myblog git clone https://github.com/vaga/hugo-theme-m10c.git themes/m10c 本地启动 hugo server -t m10c –buildDrafts 部署到远端 hugo –theme=m10c –baseUrl=“https://dg9999.github.io" –buildDrafts 会生成一个public文件夹 推到github仓库 git init git add . git commit -m “我的hugo博客第一次提交” git remote add origin https://dg9999.github.io.git git push 不行了话(git push -u origin master)
